Public Class ResourceDictionary Implements IDictionary, INameScope, ISupportInitialize, IUriContext
public ref class ResourceDictionary : System::Collections::IDictionary, System::ComponentModel::ISupportInitialize, System::Windows::Markup::INameScope, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type ResourceDictionary = class interface IDictionary interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface ISupportInitialize interface IUriContext interface INameScope

summary.span: 提供雜湊表/字典實作，其中包含元件及 WPF 應用程式之其他項目所使用的 WPF 資源。

span.span: Provides a hash table / dictionary implementation that contains WPF resources used by components and other elements of a WPF application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中的項目不會立即處理當應用程式程式碼會載入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]載入器。The items in a are not immediately processed when application code is loaded by a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] loader. 相反地，保存為物件，並只在特別要求時，才處理個別的值。Instead, the persists as an object, and the individual values are processed only when they are specifically requested. 類別不衍生自。The class is not derived from . 相反地，類別會實作但依賴內部。Instead, the class implements but relies on a internally. 在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]，則類別通常是隱含的集合項目屬於數個值的物件項目`Resources`屬性，指定屬性項目語法中時。In [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)], the class is typically an implicit collection element that is the object element value of several `Resources` properties, when given in property element syntax. 如需有關隱含的集合中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，請參閱 < [XAML 語法詳細資料](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md)。For details on implicit collections in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], see [XAML Syntax In Detail](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-syntax-in-detail.md). 例外狀況是當您想要指定合併的字典;如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 合併的資源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。An exception is when you want to specify a merged dictionary; for details, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). 另一個可能[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]是用來宣告視為離散的資源字典[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]檔案，並在執行階段與載入它或將它包含在 （完全信任） 的專案中，為資源或鬆散式檔案。Another possible [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage is to declare a resource dictionary as a discrete [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] file, and either load it at run time with or include it in a (full-trust) project as a resource or loose file. 在此情況下，可以宣告為物件項目，做為根項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In this case, can be declared as an object element, serving as the root element of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 您必須將適當的 XML 命名空間值對應 (項目的預設值[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]命名空間和通常`x:`for[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]命名空間) 拖曳至項目，如果您打算使用的根項目。You must map the appropriate XML namespace values (default for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] namespace and typically `x:` for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] namespace) onto the element if you plan to use it as the root element. 然後您可以新增子元素會定義的資源，每個都有[X:key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)值。Then you can add child elements that define the resources, each with an [x:Key](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) value. ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourcesProperty**resourcesProperty* 屬性，指定屬性的項目，其中該屬性的值型別是。A property specifying a property element, where the value type of that property is . 一般而言，這是`Resources`的屬性或是，或在應用程式資源的情況下。Typically, this is the `Resources` property of or , or of in an application resources case. *oneOrMoreResources**oneOrMoreResources* 一或多個資源指定為物件項目。One or more resources specified as object elements. 您指定每個資源必須有[X:key 指示詞](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md)指派。Each resource that you specify must have an [x:Key Directive](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/x-key-directive.md) assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要清除合併的字典的項目時，取得從特定的字典集合並特別呼叫該，雖然字典通常是遠端，而且您可能沒有存取權。If you need to clear merged dictionary items, obtain the particular dictionary from collection and specifically call on that , although typically the dictionaries are remote and you might not have access. 或者，移除整個從藉由呼叫泛型集合上的移除。Alternatively, remove the entire from by calling Remove on the generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要求的索引鍵不在這個資源字典中，framework 資源的系統也會檢查合併的字典。If the requested key is not in this resource dictionary, the framework resource system will also check the merged dictionaries. 檢查項目或索引通常不會擷取資源的慣用的方法。Checking a by item or index is not generally the preferred way to retrieve resources. 您應該改為呼叫的方法，以及能夠參與完整的資源查閱程序，依其索引鍵，查詢資源，可以在應用程式或佈景主題中尋找的資源。You should instead call methods that are capable of participating in the full resource lookup process and look up resources by their keys, and that can find the resources in applications or themes. 這種方法，且存在任何。 is such a method, and is present on any . 否則您嘗試尋找資源不符合，則為 true 的執行階段行為。Otherwise your attempt to find the resource does not match the true run-time behavior. 不過，直接從個別的字典取得資源可能是如果您擷取已知資源的適當位置，而這樣做，因此，若要避免可能的效能和範圍含意的執行階段索引鍵查閱。However, obtaining resources directly from an individual dictionary might be appropriate if you are retrieving resources from a known location, and are doing so to avoid the possible performance and scope implications of run-time key lookup. 您不使用索引子定義中的集合成員[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You do not use indexers to define collection members in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 相反地，您在子元素標記。Instead, you create child elements in markup. 子項目是其中一個子項目的，或其中的屬性類型是屬性項目的`ResourceDictionary`。The child elements are either child elements of , or of a property element where the property type is `ResourceDictionary`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 區段中的使用量。For details, see the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] usage sections in .

The collection of all keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性存在，是因為它所，但通常並不是適用於大多數案例。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 傳回的金鑰不包含索引鍵。The returned keys do not include keys within the . 也 keys 集合會是快照集基底的字典中的索引鍵。Also the keys collection is a snapshot of the keys in the base dictionary. 如果您之後變更這，儲存將不會反映所做的變更。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property MergedDictionaries As Collection(Of ResourceDictionary)

summary.span: 取得 字典的集合，這些字典在合併字典中組成了各種資源字典。

span.span: Gets a collection of the dictionaries that constitute the various resource dictionaries in the merged dictionaries.
The collection of merged dictionaries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 藉由新增合併的字典所參考的泛型集合。Dictionaries are merged by adding a to the generic collection referenced by . 合併沒有在標記中定義的資源項目。A merged does not have resource elements defined within it in markup. 相反地，是合併的字典具有任何標記子項目定義 （或透過程式碼新增任何項目），但[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]指定。Instead, the merged dictionary is a with no markup child elements defined (or with no elements added through code), but with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] specified for . 指定可讓來自外部來源，例如不同的資源組件隨附於應用程式時，合併的字典 」 鬆散[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]」，或是特定的當地語系化或全域資源組件。The designation enables the merged dictionary to come from an external source, such as a separate resource assembly that ships with the application, "loose [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]", or a specific localization or global resources assembly. 指定資源項目內具有指定不支援。Specifying resource elements within a that has specified is not supported. 中的查閱行為集合會搜尋在最後新增第一個和只要找到要求的索引鍵，搜尋會停止。Lookup behavior within the collection will search the last-added first, and the search stops as soon as a requested key is found. 合併字典集合的重複索引鍵不是不合法的。Duplicate keys across the collection of merged dictionaries are not illegal. 如需有關合併的字典行為的詳細資訊，請參閱[合併的資源字典](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md)。For more information on merged dictionary behavior, see [Merged Resource Dictionaries](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/merged-resource-dictionaries.md). ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries**oneOrMoreResourceDictionaries* 一或多個物件項目。One or more object elements. A用於沒有集合內容，並指定參考完整的屬性遠端。A used for does not have collection content, and specifies a attribute that references the complete remotely. ## Examples 下列範例會指定兩個要合併到主要的項目。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

span.span: Key of the entry to remove.

summary.span: 將具有指定索引鍵的項目從基本字典中移除。

span.span: Removes the entry with the specified key from the base dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果不包含具有指定之索引鍵的項目會維持不變。If the does not contain an element with the specified key, the remains unchanged. 會不引發任何例外狀況。No exception is raised. 這個方法不會移除索引鍵。This method does not remove keys from the . 您必須取得特定從集合移除的索引鍵，但這可能不是可能因為您通常會從遠端存取這類的字典。You must obtain the specific from the collection to remove those keys, but that might not be possible because you are typically accessing such a dictionary remotely.

span.span: The is locked or read-only.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property Uri ^ Source { Uri ^ get(); void set(Uri ^ value); };
member this.Source : Uri with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]，以從中載入資源。

span.span: Gets or sets the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] to load resources from.

value.span: 外部資源字典的來源位置。

span.span: The source location of an external resource dictionary.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，指定為組件的 URI，參考是包含未編譯的資源或內容建置動作為您的應用程式建置專案的資源字典的位置。Typically, is specified as a Pack URI, which references the location of a resource dictionary that is included as a noncompiled Resource or Content build action by your application building project. 如需 Pack URI 格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[WPF 中的 Pack Uri](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md)。For details on the Pack URI format, see [Pack URIs in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/app-development/pack-uris-in-wpf.md). 一般而言，屬性設定僅適用於指定給屬性 (為中的屬性項目[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，或做為在程式碼中集合的項目)。Generally, the property is set only for a that is specified for the property (either as a property element in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], or as a item of the collection in code). 在此情況下，設定的值將會合併，請參閱所提供的字典內容[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]到目前。In this context, setting the value for will merge the dictionary contents found at the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] into the current . 任何載入失敗會導致擲回例外狀況。Any load failures will cause an exception to be thrown. ## Examples 下列範例會指定兩個要合併到主要的項目。The following example specifies two elements to be merged into the primary . [!code-xaml[ResourceMergeDictionary#MergedXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ResourceMergeDictionary/CS/default.xaml#mergedxaml)]

summary.span: 取得與這個 中包含之索引鍵相關聯的所有值的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of all values associated with keys contained in this .
The collection of all values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性存在，是因為它所，但通常不適用於大部分案例。This property exists because it is required by , but generally is not useful for most scenarios. 傳回的值不包括內的值。The returned values do not include values within the . 同樣，集合會是快照集的基底的字典中的值。Also the collection is a snapshot of the values in the base dictionary. 如果您之後變更這，儲存將不會反映所做的變更。If you subsequently make changes to this , a stored will not reflect the changes.
